property.name: Card Number
property.value: Feast of Winterveil 7/20

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Druid, Hunter, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Rogue, Shaman, Warlock, Warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy Gingerbread Cookie > Each hero heals 7 damage from itself.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: Feast of Winterveil 3/10

property.name: Rules
property.value: 0 > Put a card from your hand into target player's hand. Use only once per turn. (He owns that card for the rest of the game.)

property.name: Card Number
property.value: Feast of Winterveil 4/10

property.name: Rules
property.value: 0 > Target player gains control of target ability, ally, or equipment you control. Use only once per turn.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: Feast of Winterveil 1/10

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target hero or ally and exhaust it.; Ongoing: Attached character can't attack or protect and has "[Activate] > Attach Hardpacked Snowball to target hero or ally and exhaust it."

property.name: Card Number
property.value: Feast of Winterveil 6/10

property.name: Rules
property.value: Elusive; When Metzen enters play, target opponent puts three Pirate ally tokens with 1 ATK / 1 health into play.; [Activate] > Ready target hero or ally. Use only if no Pirates are in play.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: Feast of Winterveil 8/10

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Druid, Hunter, Mage, Paladin, Priest, Rogue, Shaman, Warlock, Warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: You and another friendly player each exhaust your heroes > You and that player each draw a card.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: Feast of Winterveil 2/10

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose an ally type.; Ongoing: All allies also have that type. (Examples of types are Chicken, Demon, Druid, Gnome, and Yeti.)

property.name: Card Number
property.value: Feast of Winterveil 5/10

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent would draw a card, you draw one instead.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: Feast of Winterveil 9/10

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card. If it's December, draw another card.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: Feast of Winterveil 10/10

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.; Reward: Draw a card. Then, you may discard a Gingerbread Cookie card. If you do, search your deck for a Feast of Winter Veil card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: Burning Crusade 3/3

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, pay 13 to complete this quest. Reward: Remove your deck and graveyard from the game. Build a new ten-card deck using cards from your entire collection.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: Burning Crusade 2/3

property.name: Rules
property.value: 4, Flip Varanis Bitterstar --> Varanis deals 2 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Draw a card. Use only on your turn.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: Burning Crusade 1/3

property.name: Rules
property.value: 3, Flip Nimaasus --> Numaasus deals X holy damage to target ally, where X is the amount of damage that ally dealt to Nimaasus this turn.

property.name: Card Number
property.value: BlizzCon 0/2

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mrglrglmrglmrrrlggg attacks, say "Mrglrglmrglmrrrlggg!" Then, put two Murloc ally tokens with +1 ATK, 1 health, and ferocity into play.
